headline: MicroStrategy Faces $9 Billion Outflow Risk as Index Providers Eye Bitcoin Holdings
summary: MicroStrategy has to manage its Bitcoin position, funding costs, and meet shareholder expectations as index providers review BTC-based rules.

headline: MSCI May Exclude Digital Asset Treasury Firms, Putting “Meaningful Pressure” on the Sector
summary: The global crypto sector is bracing for potential turbulence as major index provider MSCI weighs whether to exclude digital asset–heavy companies from its flagship equity benchmarks, a move analysts warn could force billions in passive outflows early next year. Key Takeaways: MSCI is considering removing Bitcoin-heavy treasury companies from its ...
